title: Elle Vosque Almost Wins Big Drag Race Show
summary: Elle Vosque, a drag queen from Northern Ireland, came in second place on a TV show called Ru Paul's Drag Race UK. She was in the final with other queens, and the winner was Bones. Friends and fans watched the show together at a bar in Belfast to support her. This was Elle's first time performing outside of Northern Ireland. People like Trudy Scrumptious and The Only Sassie said they are very proud of Elle and think she shows the best of Belfast's drag scene. Drag is a fun way people dress up and perform to express themselves.

background_read: Drag is a type of performance where people dress up in costumes, often to entertain others. Ru Paul's Drag Race is a popular TV show where drag queens compete in challenges. Belfast is a city in Northern Ireland, and Elle Vosque is a drag queen from there who became famous on the show. This article talks about her success and how her community supported her.
Article_Structure: WHO: Elle Vosque, a drag queen from Northern Ireland, and her friends and fans
WHAT: Elle came in second place in the Drag Race UK final, and people celebrated her
WHERE: The events happened in Belfast, at Union Street bar
WHY: To show support for Elle and highlight Belfast's drag talent

perspectives.description: Friends and fans are happy and proud of Elle for representing Belfast.
Elle achieved success by performing outside Northern Ireland for the first time.
